die.title: Die
die.description: The number of sides the die has (e.g. d4, d6, d8, etc.)

times.title: Times
times.description: Number of dice to be rolled.

adjustment.title: Die Roll Adjustment
adjustment.description: An adjustment to the die roll adding to the roll is as simple as using the integer value. A penalty to the roll is a negative integer.

value.title: Rolled Value
value.description: The value of dice rolled, added together, and adjusted.

roll.title: Dice Rolls
roll.description: An array of dice to roll. Each set of rolled dice will be returned as a unique object with a calculated value.
